Translations.Text: wa-idha ra-aytahum tuʿ'jibuka ajsamuhum wa-in yaqulu tasmaʿ liqawlihim ka-annahum khushubun musannadatun yahsabuna kulla sayhatin ʿalayhim humu l-ʿaduwu fa-ih'dharhum qatalahumu l-lahu anna yu'fakuna
wa-idha qila lahum taʿalaw yastaghfir lakum rasulu l-lahi lawwaw ruusahum wara-aytahum yasudduna wahum mus'takbiruna
sawaon ʿalayhim astaghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lan yaghfira l-lahu lahum inna l-laha la yahdi l-qawma l-fasiqina
humu alladhina yaquluna la tunfiqu ʿala man ʿinda rasuli l-lahi hatta yanfaddu walillahi khazainu l-samawati wal-ardi walakinna l-munafiqina la yafqahuna
yaquluna la-in rajaʿna ila l-madinati layukh'rijanna l-aʿazu min'ha l-adhala walillahi l-ʿizatu walirasulihi walil'mu'minina walakinna l-munafiqina la yaʿlamuna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tul'hikum amwalukum wala awladukum ʿan dhik'ri l-lahi waman yafʿal dhalika fa-ulaika humu l-khasiruna
wa-anfiqu min ma razaqnakum min qabli an yatiya ahadakumu l-mawtu fayaqula rabbi lawla akhartani ila ajalin qaribin fa-assaddaqa wa-akun mina l-salihina
walan yu-akhira l-lahu nafsan idha jaa ajaluha wal-lahu khabirun bima taʿmaluna
yusabbihu lillahi ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi lahu l-mul'ku walahu l-hamdu wahuwa ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
huwa alladhi khalaqakum faminkum kafirun waminkum mu'minun wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna basirun
khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi wasawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum wa-ilayhi l-masiru
yaʿlamu ma fi l-samawati wal-ardi wayaʿlamu ma tusirruna wama tuʿ'linuna wal-lahu ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
alam yatikum naba-u alladhina kafaru min qablu fadhaqu wabala amrihim walahum ʿadhabun alimun
dhalika bi-annahu kanat tatihim rusuluhum bil-bayinati faqalu abasharun yahdunana fakafaru watawallaw wa-is'taghna l-lahu wal-lahu ghaniyyun hamidun
zaʿama alladhina kafaru an lan yub'ʿathu qul bala warabbi latub'ʿathunna thumma latunabba-unna bima ʿamil'tum wadhalika ʿala l-lahi yasirun
faaminu bil-lahi warasulihi wal-nuri alladhi anzalna wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna khabirun

yawma yajmaʿukum liyawmi l-jamʿi dhalika yawmu l-taghabuni waman yu'min bil-lahi wayaʿmal salihan yukaffir ʿanhu sayyiatihi wayud'khil'hu jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha abadan dhalika l-fawzu l-ʿazimu
wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu l-nari khalidina fiha wabi'sa l-masiru
ma asaba min musibatin illa bi-idh'ni l-lahi waman yu'min bil-lahi yahdi qalbahu wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalimun
wa-atiʿu l-laha wa-atiʿu l-rasula fa-in tawallaytum fa-innama ʿala rasulina l-balaghu l-mubinu
al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa waʿala l-lahi falyatawakkali l-mu'minuna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu inna min azwajikum wa-awladikum ʿaduwwan lakum fa-ih'dharuhum wa-in taʿfu watasfahu wataghfiru fa-inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
innama amwalukum wa-awladukum fit'natun wal-lahu ʿindahu ajrun ʿazimun
fa-ittaqu l-laha ma is'tataʿtum wa-is'maʿu wa-atiʿu wa-anfiqu khayran li-anfusikum waman yuqa shuhha nafsihi fa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
in tuq'ridu l-laha qardan hasanan yudaʿif'hu lakum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu shakurun halimun
ʿalimu l-ghaybi wal-shahadati l-ʿazizu l-hakimu
